=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: Stocks to buy for long term: From Bharat Forge, BoB to Bajaj Auto— Nirmal Bang suggests 10 shares for up to 50% returns
Source: LiveMint - Markets
Published: 2025-12-28 03:03
Related Stocks: General Market News
Categories: markets

Summary:
Stocks to buy for the long term: According to Nirmal Bang, several stocks, including Bharat Forge, Bank of Baroda, Bajaj Auto, Paytm, and SRF, show strong bullish patterns. Key support levels are outlined, with expectations for upward price movements in the near term.

Sentiment: positive
